XIV.4.B.1.
b
.
Security Briefings
The Veterans Service Center Manager (VSCM) and Pension Management Center Manager (PMCM) shall ensure that all employees who handle FTI are briefed annually on
IRS safeguard requirements, and
the provisions of
Internal Revenue Code (IRC) Sections 7213(a)
and
7431
concerning criminal and civil penalties for unauthorized disclosure of tax data.
A security briefing must be held for each new employee as soon as they report for duty.
Important
:  A list of the employees attending the briefing must be maintained for two years.  After subsequent briefings, the list from two years prior will be destroyed under
RCS VB-1, 13-100.300
.
